name: Pacific Knights (Alpha)
description:
This game is made by me (Todor Vankov) and my friend Dani de Devel (Daniel Brück). Daniel Brück created the ship part of the game, and I created the airplane campania. The game is still in alpha version. We used Unreal Engine 4 (UE4).

We recommend a strong DX11 graphics card (Geforce 970 / Radeon RX 570 60@FHD - Geforce 1080 / Radeon RX Vega 56 60@WQHD)

You can recive a bit more informatiopn at this links:

Dodumentation 

Instagram

Wish you will have fun with this game and feel free to lat a comment :)
